titles.title: Sing About the Love of the Father

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 c2 v3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have you had your fill yet of emptiness Vanity of vanities, nothing new under the sun Why spend your money for what is not bread Why spend your wages for what does not satisfy Incline your ear, listen to Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have you found your freedom living by the rules Got a heavy burden and you’re bearing it all by yourself Come to the waters every one who thirsts You without money, come Receive what’s freely given Delight yourself in Him chorus2: Can you hear the music and the dancing The Father’s laid the table and the banquet has begun Yes He’s gone and killed the fatted calf For the dead and lost made alive and found again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
